sentences.sContent: There something undeniably soulful about the eerie whine of the highland bagpipes.
sentences.sContent_eng: There something undeniably soulful about the eerie whine of the highland bagpipes.
sentences.sCn: 高原风笛神秘的哀鸣有着让人无法抗拒的深情。

sentences.sContent: After upholding to scold the folded wife, a second-hand husband moulds the threshold in shorthand on the highland.
sentences.sContent_eng: After upholding to scold the folded wife, a second-hand husband moulds the threshold in shorthand on the highland.
sentences.sCn: 在赞成责骂被折叠的妻子之后，二手丈夫在高地以速记法铸成了一个门槛。

remMethod.val: high(高处) + land(陆地) → 高地， 高原

words.tran: 苏格兰高地的人；高地人
